name: Backxwash
description: '''Ashanti Mutinta''', known professionally as '''Backxwash''', is a [[Zambia]]n-[[Canadians|Canadian]] rapper and [[record producer]] based in [[Montreal]], [[Quebec]]. She is most noted for her 2020 album ''[[God Has Nothing to Do with This Leave Him Out of It]]'', which won the [[2020 Polaris Music Prize]].
